title: Unique Paths in a Grid
desc:
You are given an m x n grid. Your task is to count the number of unique paths from the top-left corner (1,1) to the bottom-right corner (m,n). You can only move either down or right at any point in time.

Print the number of unique paths modulo 10^9+7.
answer: Use combinatorics: The number of unique paths from (1,1) to (m,n) is C(m+n-2, m-1).
